info.title: Open VSX Registry API
info.description: This API provides metadata of VS Code extensions in the Open VSX Registry as well as means to publish extensions.

post.summary: Publish an extension by uploading a vsix file

Location.description: The URL of the extension metadata

400.description: The extension could not be published

429.description: A client has sent too many requests in a given amount of time

X-Rate-Limit-Retry-After-Seconds.description: Number of seconds to wait after receiving a 429 response

Location.description: The URL of the namespace metadata

400.description: The namespace could not be created

429.description: A client has sent too many requests in a given amount of time

X-Rate-Limit-Retry-After-Seconds.description: Number of seconds to wait after receiving a 429 response

get.summary: Provides metadata of extensions matching the given parameters

parameters.name: extensionUuid
parameters.description: Universally unique identifier of an extension

parameters.name: namespaceUuid
parameters.description: Universally unique identifier of a namespace

parameters.name: includeAllVersions
parameters.description: Whether to include all versions of an extension, ignored if extensionVersion is specified

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Maximal number of entries to return

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of entries to skip (usually a multiple of the page size)

200.description: Returns the (possibly empty) query results

400.description: The request contains an invalid parameter value

example.error: The 'extensionId' parameter must have the format 'namespace.extension'.

429.description: A client has sent too many requests in a given amount of time

X-Rate-Limit-Retry-After-Seconds.description: Number of seconds to wait after receiving a 429 response

post.summary: Provides metadata of extensions matching the given parameters. Deprecated: use GET /api/-/query instead.

429.description: A client has sent too many requests in a given amount of time

X-Rate-Limit-Retry-After-Seconds.description: Number of seconds to wait after receiving a 429 response

post.summary: Publish an extension by uploading a vsix file

Location.description: The URL of the extension metadata

400.description: The extension could not be published

429.description: A client has sent too many requests in a given amount of time

X-Rate-Limit-Retry-After-Seconds.description: Number of seconds to wait after receiving a 429 response

Location.description: The URL of the namespace metadata

400.description: The namespace could not be created

429.description: A client has sent too many requests in a given amount of time

X-Rate-Limit-Retry-After-Seconds.description: Number of seconds to wait after receiving a 429 response

200.description: The namespace metadata are returned in JSON format

404.description: The specified namespace could not be found

429.description: A client has sent too many requests in a given amount of time

X-Rate-Limit-Retry-After-Seconds.description: Number of seconds to wait after receiving a 429 response

get.summary: Provides metadata of the latest version of an extension

404.description: The specified extension could not be found

get.summary: Access a file packaged by an extension

200.description: The file content is returned

302.description: The file is found at the specified location

Location.description: The actual URL where the file can be accessed

404.description: The specified file could not be found

429.description: A client has sent too many requests in a given amount of time

X-Rate-Limit-Retry-After-Seconds.description: Number of seconds to wait after receiving a 429 response

get.summary: Provides a map of versions matching an extension

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Maximal number of entries to return

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of entries to skip (usually a multiple of the page size)

200.description: The extension versions are returned in JSON format

404.description: The specified extension could not be found

429.description: A client has sent too many requests in a given amount of time

X-Rate-Limit-Retry-After-Seconds.description: Number of seconds to wait after receiving a 429 response

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of entries to skip (usually a multiple of the page size)

200.description: The extension version references are returned in JSON format

404.description: The specified extension could not be found

429.description: A client has sent too many requests in a given amount of time

X-Rate-Limit-Retry-After-Seconds.description: Number of seconds to wait after receiving a 429 response

200.description: The extension version references are returned in JSON format

200.description: The reviews are returned in JSON format

X-Rate-Limit-Retry-After-Seconds.description: Number of seconds to wait after receiving a 429 response

get.summary: Check if a personal access token is valid and is allowed to publish in a namespace

200.description: The provided PAT is valid and is allowed to publish extensions in the namespace

400.description: The token has no publishing permission in the namespace or is not valid

404.description: The specified namespace could not be found

429.description: A client has sent too many requests in a given amount of time

X-Rate-Limit-Retry-After-Seconds.description: Number of seconds to wait after receiving a 429 response

200.description: The namespace details are returned in JSON format

404.description: The specified namespace could not be found

429.description: A client has sent too many requests in a given amount of time

X-Rate-Limit-Retry-After-Seconds.description: Number of seconds to wait after receiving a 429 response

404.description: The specified namespace could not be found

429.description: A client has sent too many requests in a given amount of time

X-Rate-Limit-Retry-After-Seconds.description: Number of seconds to wait after receiving a 429 response

200.description: The registry version is returned in JSON format

404.description: The registry version could not be determined

429.description: A client has sent too many requests in a given amount of time

X-Rate-Limit-Retry-After-Seconds.description: Number of seconds to wait after receiving a 429 response

get.summary: Provides metadata of extensions matching the given parameters

parameters.name: extensionUuid
parameters.description: Universally unique identifier of an extension

parameters.name: namespaceUuid
parameters.description: Universally unique identifier of a namespace

parameters.name: includeAllVersions
parameters.description: Whether to include all versions of an extension

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Maximal number of entries to return

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of entries to skip (usually a multiple of the page size)

200.description: Returns the (possibly empty) query results

400.description: The request contains an invalid parameter value

429.description: A client has sent too many requests in a given amount of time

X-Rate-Limit-Retry-After-Seconds.description: Number of seconds to wait after receiving a 429 response

get.summary: Search extensions via text entered by a user

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Extension category as shown in the UI

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Maximal number of entries to return

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of entries to skip (usually a multiple of the page size)

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Sort key (relevance is a weighted mix of various properties)

parameters.name: includeAllVersions
parameters.description: Whether to include information on all available versions for each returned entry

200.description: The search results are returned in JSON format

400.description: The request contains an invalid parameter value

example.error: The parameter 'size' must not be negative.

429.description: A client has sent too many requests in a given amount of time

X-Rate-Limit-Retry-After-Seconds.description: Number of seconds to wait after receiving a 429 response

parameters.name: publicId
parameters.description: Public ID of a public key file

200.description: The file content is returned

404.description: The specified public key file could not be found

429.description: A client has sent too many requests in a given amount of time

X-Rate-Limit-Retry-After-Seconds.description: Number of seconds to wait after receiving a 429 response

Badge.description: A badge to be shown in the sidebar of the extension page in the registry

href.description: The link users will follow when clicking the badge

namespaceUrl.description: URL to get metadata of the extension's namespace

reviewsUrl.description: URL to get the list of reviews of this extension

files.description: Map of file types (download, manifest, icon, readme, license, changelog) to their respective URLs

version.description: Selected version, or the latest version if none was specified

preRelease.description: Indicates whether this is a pre-release version

publishedBy.description: Data of the user who published this version

verified.description: The value 'true' means the publishing user is a privileged user or the publishing user is a member of the extension's namespace and the namespace has at least one owner.

unrelatedPublisher.description: Deprecated: use 'verified' instead (this property is just the negation of 'verified')

namespaceAccess.description: Access level of the extension's namespace. Deprecated: namespaces are now always restricted

allVersions.description: Map of available versions to their metadata URLs. Deprecated: only returns the last 100 versions. Use allVersionsUrl instead.

allVersionsUrl.description: URL to get a map of available versions to their metadata URLs.

downloadCount.description: Number of downloads of the extension package

timestamp.description: Date and time when this version was published (ISO-8601)

preview.description: Indicates whether this is a preview extension

displayName.description: Name to be displayed in user interfaces

namespaceDisplayName.description: Namespace name to be displayed in user interfaces

engines.description: Map of engine names to the respective version constraints

extensionKind.description: A list that indicates where the extension should run in remote configurations. Values are "ui" (run locally), "workspace" (run on remote machine) and "web"

repository.description: URL of the extension's source repository

bugs.description: URL of the extension's bug tracker

markdown.description: Markdown rendering engine to use in user interfaces

galleryColor.description: CSS color to use as background in user interfaces

localizedLanguages.description: Languages the extension has been translated in

qna.description: URL of the extension's Q&A page

badges.description: List of badges to display in user interfaces

dependencies.description: List of dependencies to other extensions

bundledExtensions.description: List of extensions bundled with this extension

downloads.description: Map of download links by target platform

allTargetPlatformVersions.description: Map of target platforms by extension version

deprecated.description: Indicates whether the extension is deprecated

replacement.description: Reference to extension that replaces this extension when it's deprecated

downloadable.description: Whether to show downloads in user interfaces

ExtensionReference.description: A reference to another extension in the registry

url.description: URL to get metadata of the referenced extension

displayName.description: Name to be displayed in user interfaces

extensions.description: Map of extension names to their metadata URLs (not required for creating)

verified.description: Indicates whether the namespace has an owner (not required for creating)

access.description: Access level of the namespace. Deprecated: namespaces are now always restricted

success.description: Indicates success of the operation (omitted if a more specific result type is returned)

warning.description: Indicates a warning; when this is present, other properties can still be used

error.description: Indicates an error; when this is present, all other properties should be ignored

socialLinks.description: Map of social network names to their profile URLs

extensions.description: Map of extension names to their metadata URLs

verified.description: Indicates whether the namespace has an owner

extensionUuid.description: Universally unique identifier of an extension

namespaceUuid.description: Universally unique identifier of a namespace

includeAllVersions.description: Whether to include all versions of an extension, ignored if extensionVersion is specified

size.description: Maximal number of entries to return

offset.description: Number of entries to skip (usually a multiple of the page size)
Number of skipped entries according to the query

totalSize.description: Total number of entries that match the query

extensions.description: Extensions that match the given query (may be empty)

success.description: Indicates success of the operation (omitted if a more specific result type is returned)

warning.description: Indicates a warning; when this is present, other properties can still be used

error.description: Indicates an error; when this is present, all other properties should be ignored

success.description: Indicates success of the operation (omitted if a more specific result type is returned)

warning.description: Indicates a warning; when this is present, other properties can still be used

error.description: Indicates an error; when this is present, all other properties should be ignored

user.description: Data of the user who posted this review

timestamp.description: Date and time when this review was posted (ISO-8601)

ReviewList.description: List of reviews of an extension

SearchEntry.description: Summary of metadata of an extension

url.description: URL to get the full metadata of the extension

files.description: Map of file types (download, manifest, icon, readme, license, changelog) to their respective URLs

timestamp.description: Date and time when this version was published (ISO-8601)

verified.description: The value 'true' means the publishing user is a privileged user or the publishing user is a member of the extension's namespace and the namespace has at least one owner.

allVersions.description: Essential metadata of all available versions. Deprecated: only returns the last 100 versions. Use allVersionsUrl instead.

allVersionsUrl.description: URL to get essential metadata of all available versions.

downloadCount.description: Number of downloads of the extension package

displayName.description: Name to be displayed in user interfaces

deprecated.description: Indicates whether the extension is deprecated

offset.description: Number of skipped entries according to the search query

totalSize.description: Total number of entries that match the search query

extensions.description: List of matching entries, limited to the size specified in the search query

SearchResult.description: List of extensions matching a search query

avatarUrl.description: URL to the user's avatar image

homepage.description: URL to the user's profile page

VersionReference.description: Essential metadata of an extension version

url.description: URL to get the full metadata of this version

files.description: Map of file types (download, manifest, icon, readme, license, changelog) to their respective URLs

engines.description: Map of engine names to the respective version constraints

VersionReferences.description: List of version references matching an extension

success.description: Indicates success of the operation (omitted if a more specific result type is returned)

warning.description: Indicates a warning; when this is present, other properties can still be used

error.description: Indicates an error; when this is present, all other properties should be ignored

offset.description: Number of skipped entries according to the version references request

totalSize.description: Total number of version references the extension has

versions.description: Essential metadata of all available versions, limited to the size specified in the version references request

Versions.description: Map of versions matching an extension

success.description: Indicates success of the operation (omitted if a more specific result type is returned)

warning.description: Indicates a warning; when this is present, other properties can still be used

error.description: Indicates an error; when this is present, all other properties should be ignored

offset.description: Number of skipped entries according to the versions request

totalSize.description: Total number of versions the extension has

versions.description: Map of versions, limited to the size specified in the versions request
